tuv.seg: Safefood - the Food Safety Promotion Board
Biaslán - An Bord um Chur Chun Cinn na Sábháilteachta Bia
Safefood (the Food Safety Promotion Board), is one of a number of North/South bodies set up in Ireland as a result of the Good Friday Agreement
Tá Biaslán (An Bord um Chur Chun Cinn na Sábháilteachta Bia), ar cheann de na comhlachtaí Thuaidh/Theas a bunaíodh in Éirinn mar thoradh ar Chomhaontú Aoine an Chéasta
The organisation was set up to promote awareness and knowledge of food safety and nutrition issues on the island of Ireland
Bunaíodh an eagraíocht chun feasacht agus eolas a chur chun cinn ar shábháilteacht bhia agus ar shaincheisteanna cothaithe ar oileán na hÉireann
Safefood is based in Ireland, but conducts its work on an all-island basis
Tá Biaslán bunaithe in Éirinn, agus déanann sé a chuid oibre ar bhunús uile-oileáin
This organisation reports to the North South Ministerial Council (NSMC)
Tá an eagraíocht freagrach don Chomhairle Aireachta Thuaidh/Theas
Safefood aims to to create an environment where consumers everywhere in Ireland can have confidence in the food they eat
Tá sé d’aidhm ag Biaslán timpeallacht a chruthú inar féidir le tomhaltóirí i ngach áit in Éirinn muinín a bheith acu as an mbia a itheann siad
They provide advice and guidance to the food industry and to consumers
Cuireann siad comhairle agus treoir ar fáil don tionscal bia agus do thomhaltóirí
